Hello all,
Making a couple adjustments to the backsline to work some other players in.  I am selling off my P42 Johnson SGC 40.  I would consider a partial trade for some VG-VGEX backs that I don't have.
$$$$ delivered and insured.
This one has got to go fast, bills to pay, but don't want to move to ebay.  I need atleast $750 plus trade of the HOF backs listed below if interested in a cash and trade.
Thanks,
Bob
upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com


[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1232807833.JPG[/IMG]

Biggest targets are Cycle 350 Collins, SC 150 Fact 649 Lajoie.
